commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh? Where's Rina?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Rinari? She's right over... Huh, where'd she go?!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: If you are looking for Rina, she got changed and took off. She leaves right after practice finishes these days.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Yeah. I've been asking her to go out for ice cream with me and she's turned me down every single time.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I see.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: It's only been happening lately, right? I wonder what the sudden change is? She used to always hang out and chat with us.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What could've happened?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I tried asking her about it, but she said it was nothing...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: She says it's nothing, but it certainly doesn't seem like it.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I really wanna know! What could she be choosing over ice cream with us?!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I know, let's try tailing her tomorrow!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: That might be taking it a bit too far...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Not at all! We're just worried about her!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I've never come to this part of the courtyard before... What even is this place?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Nijigasaki is quite big, after all. I'm not exactly sure what's here, though. Karin, do you know?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Um... I think there's an auditorium on the other side of the courtyard here.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Karin, your sense of direction is way off.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hahaha... Whoa, guys! Hide! Rina's stopped!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: What could she be doing in a place like this?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Ah!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Setsu, shush! Shhhhh!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Sorry to keep you waiting. Have you been a good kitty?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: There, there. Sorry your dinner's late. Eat up.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Aww, you can slow down! No one's gonna take it from you.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: It's so cuuuute!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Agh! You scared me!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: How could you keep this ridiculously adorable little kitten all to yourself?! Lemme hold it next, Setsuna!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So this is what you've been up to.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Guys... Um...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You've been leaving early to take care of this kitten, haven't you?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yeah. It's still a kitten, but I don't see its parents anywhere. Someone had to take care of it.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: In that case, I wish you would've talked to us.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'm sorry. I figured everyone was busy with practice.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You are too, aren't you?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Aww... Rina-chan Board says, "Sad-face."

commands.select_args: ||We should all help take care of it!|| select_1
||Could we give you a hand?|| select_2

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We should all help take care of it!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: What? Really? Rina-chan Board says, "Yippee!"

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Could we give you a hand?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: It might be fun for us all to take care of the kitten. Rina-chan Board says, "Woo-hoo!"

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Now first things first, what should we name it?
